pullrequest.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

content.raw: You could either \(1\) add multiple transformations using multiple links and fixed joints or \(2\) figure out the overall transformation and apply it at once in one of the `origin` blocks using the math capabilities of xacro \(and connect the new link directly with `base_link`\).
content.html: You could either (1) add multiple transformations using multiple links and fixed joints or (2) figure out the overall transformation and apply it at once in one of the origin blocks using the math capabilities of xacro (and connect the new link directly with base_link).
